unnormalised: Hey guys, return policies are so crucial, right? Especially during Diwali shopping! I remember buying a saree online and it was totally the wrong size, like a tent. Thankfully, the return was easy. Imagine the hassle if it wasn't! Good returns are like a plate of hot biryani on a cold day – comforting! So, always check them before you buy anything, even from your favorite brand. Shanti Stores has a great one, by the way!
